HomePageDescription: Pleasure and Convenience in Your Work Together with Digigarson! Designed for restaurant and cafe operators, Digigarson simplifies your business processes and increases your efficiency. We make your work easier by bringing together all your needs, from ordering to management panel, from accounting to mobile applications, on a single platform. While maximizing customer satisfaction, we prioritized the comfort and convenience of business owners. With Digigarson, we are with you and your customers in every corner of your business. Now enjoy this enjoyable and easy experience!
NewAdditionP: Digigarson offers a comprehensive technological solution for the restaurant, cafe and hotel industry. In addition to the standard ticket program, it provides a wide range of services to businesses with the management panel, pre-accounting and mobile applications. Thanks to this platform, businesses can facilitate their financial transactions and service Digigarson can increase its speed and offer customers a special experience via mobile, while meeting technological needs at the highest level, it also increases the success and prestige of the business
SectionMomenth2: Digigarson is with you at every moment, every step of the way!
SectionMomenth3: Managing with Digigarson is Very Easy...
SectionMomentP: Digigarson offers a comprehensive solution for restaurant and cafe owners to facilitate their business processes and increase efficiency. This comprehensive platform consists of the following components: Billing Program: An effective and fast tool for order management and calculations. Management Panel: All operations of your business A central control panel that you can easily manage. Preliminary Accounting: An integrated accounting solution where you can easily manage and track your financial transactions. Waiter Handheld Terminal: A mobile tool for waiters to quickly record and transmit orders, designed for business owners. A special mobile application that allows you to monitor the general status of the business at any time. Customer Application: A platform where customers can either download and use it directly to their phones or benefit from services without downloading the application by scanning the QR code. This holistic approach allows you to manage every aspect of your business more effectively and provide customer service. maximizes satisfaction. Digigarson is with you in every corner of your business!
OurTechnologiesliP2: We are always with you 24/7 with our free and experienced team.
OurTechnologiesliP4: It is a mobile tool compatible with all phones, allowing waiters to quickly record orders and transmit them to the system..
OurTechnologiesliP6: Cash, Bank, Check-Note, Customers, Invoices... and even Recipe transactions! Here you have it, all these modules...
OurTechnologiesliP8: Provides business owners with mobile access to all business transactions and reports from anywhere.
Customerh3: With Digigarson, Revolution in Technology, Smiles in Customers!
CustomerP: Successful businesses prioritize customer happiness. Digigarson increases both your success and prestige by working for you 24/7.
Productsh1: Pleasure and Convenience in Your Work with Digigarson!
ProductsP: Designed for restaurant and cafe operators, Digigarson simplifies your business processes and increases your efficiency. We make your business easier by bringing together all your needs, from ordering to management panels, from accounting to mobile applications, on a single platform. While maximizing customer satisfaction, business owners will experience the convenience and We put convenience first. With Digigarson, we are here for you and your customers in every corner of your business. Now you too can experience this pleasant and easy experience!
Newsh1: If you would like to receive news from us...
NewsP: Would you like to be informed about the latest developments?
Content1P: Digigarson is a comprehensive business management and automation system prepared for restaurant, cafe and hotel businesses.
Content2: What features does it have other than the billing program?
Content2P: Digigarson has many integrated features such as management panel, pre-accounting, waiter handheld terminal applications, Boss Application and customer application
Content3: Can my customers place orders without downloading the application?
Content3P: Yes, your customers can access the menu by scanning the QR code and place their orders without downloading the application.
Content4P: Yes, with Digigarson, in addition to standard pricing, you can easily make special pricing such as staff price, room service price, pick-up price, package service price.
News1: Follow us for the latest developments and news.
